message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $95?
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob. I can do $110, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. It's a great product and I think you'll really like it.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose $100 as the price for the product, as that aligns closely with my budget.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $110, but I really think you're going to love this product, so I'm willing to meet you halfway at $105. That's as low as I can go.
